name: 2 tbl hot pepper sauce (or Tabasco sauce)
2-1/2 to 3 lbs chicken, cut into piece (boneless breasts)
9 oz. vegetable oil (3 oz per pan)
1 tsp rice wine or dry sherry
1 tsp minced ginger (ground ginger works too)
cornstarch (if mixture is not solid enough)
2 large onions sliced into thin rounds
1 lg egg beaten with 1 tbl oil
1 (11.5 oz) package milk chocolate morsels (semi-sweet ok)
1 1/2 lb top round steak about 1" thick
3-4 cutlets (pork, veal, chicken; pounded to 1/4 or so)
2 large garlic cloves, minced (1 lg tsp minced garlic)
4 leaves chopped sage (~1+ tsp rubbed sage)
1 1/4 cups buttermilk (1+ tbl lemon juice + milk to 1 1/4 c)
4 carrots, halved and cut into 2" lengths
2 pkgs dry yeast (2 1/4 tsp/packet =4 1/2 tsp total)
1/2 cup grated Romano or Parmesan cheese
3/4 tsp salt (optional, was too salty last time)
1 clove garlic or 1/2 tsp minced garlic
2 tsp fresh cilantro leaves or chopped green onion
4 cups cooked turkey, in large pieces
1/4 cup roasted garlic and oil (see recipe: Roasted Garlic)
1 24 oz package (8 patties) frozen hash browns
5 Tbl butter, cut into 1/4 inch cubes
cayenne or regular pepper to taste
14 oz can of diced tomatoes, drained
As many ears of corn on the cob as you want
2 tbl lemon juice (just buy a real lemon)
A few drops red food coloring
1-1/2 cups Minute Maid Low Acid orange juice
1 - 8 oz can pineapple chunks with juice
Bath - 4 cups water, 1/2 cup baking soda
1 18.25 oz box devil's food cake mix
300 ml soy milk (Silk Very Van is good) (3 liters)
1 cup Minute Maid Low Acid Orange Juice
8 tbl melted butter (or Smart Balance Light)
1 egg substitute (1 Tbl water + 1 1/2 tsp powder)
1/2 cup milk (or very van soy milk)
1 (2 to 3 pound ) whole chicken, cut into pieces
1 (2 to 3 pound ) whole chicken, cut into pieces
1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix
dash of freshly ground black pepper
salt and white pepper to taste
Cheese, Montery Jack and Cheddar or mix, shredded or cubed
